text: Francisco "Frankie" Muniz IV (born December 5, 1985) is an American actor. He was born in Ridgewood, New Jersey and grew up in Wood-Ridge, New Jersey, Raleigh, North Carolina and Burbank, Los Angeles. He is best known for his role as Malcolm in the television sitcom Malcolm in the Middle. He is now a NASCAR racecar driver. He drives the number 30 Ford. ==References== == Other websites == * *NASCAR information Category:People from Ridgewood, New Jersey Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Actors from North Carolina Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American racecar drivers Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from Raleigh, North Carolina Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Raleigh, North Carolina Category:NASCAR drivers
title: Frankie Muniz
